overview.base: You can passively smell the types of all living creatures within 30 feet. You can detect dead and undead creatures as well, but you cannot distinguish within or between them. They all smell like death. You also gain @L[Ability:Scent Seeing]{Scent Seeing}. You can not detect @L[Condition:Odorless]{odorless} creatures in this way.

You know the exact location of all target creatures. You continue to know the location of all targets within 10 feet, whether they are or you are moving or not, so long as they are still within 10 feet of you.

system.requirements: You are not @L[Condition:Anosmatic]{anosmatic} and the target is not @L[Condition:Odorless]{odorless}.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Battle Cry Aura]{Battle Cry Aura} and @L[Ability:Battle Cry Resistance]{Battle Cry Resistance}.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the targets' @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.
You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

overview.base: You gain 15 @L[Core:Temporary Hit Points]{temporary HP} and become @L[Condition:Frenzied]{frenzied}.
overview.proficient: You gain an additional 5 × @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} @L[Core:Temporary Hit Points]{temporary HP} and gain @L[Ability:Fast]{Fast}.
overview.fluent: You instead gain an additional 5 × @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F} @L[Core:Temporary Hit Points]{temporary HP} and gain @L[Ability:Swift]{Swift}.

system.endCondition: You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Beastly Strength]{Beastly Strength} and @L[Ability:Improved Armor Piercing]{Improved Armor Piercing}.

Can wield @L[Property:Two-Handed]{two-handed} weapons in one hand.
Note: @L[Property:AP]{AP} weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.
Melee weapons you use are @L[Property:Armor Piercing]{armor piercing}.
You cannot use items in your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands}.
You gain @L[Ability:Bite]{Bite} and become @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluent} in it. Additionally, your @L[Category:Equipment]{mouth} is @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.

Your @L[Equipment:Mouth]{mouth} counts as a @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
